attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2004-0126

Date: 2004-02-24

                 Whereas The District of Tumbler Ridge Chamber of Commerce, in the Province of British Columbia, the certificate of formation of which was recorded under the provisions of the Boards of Trade Act on July 20, 1984, has ceased to exercise its franchises;

 

                 Therefore, Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, pursuant to section 43 of the Boards of Trade Act, hereby dissolves as a corporation The District of Tumbler Ridge Chamber of Commerce.


                 Attendu que The District of Tumbler Ridge Chamber of Commerce (Colombie-Britannique), dont le certificat de constitution a été enregistré en vertu de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce le 20 juillet 1984 a cessé d’exercer ses pouvoirs,

 

                 À ces causes, sur recommandation de la ministre de l’Industrie et en vertu de l’article 43 de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil dissout The District of Tumbler Ridge Chamber of Commerce en tant que personne morale.
